pageTitle: Public events for December 6, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, December 6, 2015:

Montréal

5:00 p.m.  – The Prime Minister takes part in a commemorative ceremony at the Mont-Royal Belvedere chalet to honour the 14 women killed during the 1989 attack on the École Polytechnique Montréal.

Mont-Royal Belvedere chalet
Mont-Royal
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Media should direct questions regarding the event to Linda Boutin, Public Affairs Division, City of Montréal, at 514-872-7218.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
